Speed: 0 ft. (cannot move from socket), fly 0 ft. (hover locked in place)

Traits.Name: Socket-Bound
Traits.Content: The Hologram AI cannot leave a 20 ft. radius of its emitter. Destroying the emitter ends the projection.

Traits.Name: Incorporeal Image
Traits.Content: The Hologram AI is immune to physical damage, but vulnerable to lightning and psychic damage.

Traits.Name: Archive Access
Traits.Content: The Hologram AI knows vast fragments of history, but its memory is corrupted and fragmented, leading to potentially misleading information.

Actions.Name: Data Pulse
Actions.Content: Ranged Attack: +3 to hit, dealing 10 (2d6 + 4) psychic damage. The target must succeed on a DC 13 Wisdom saving throw or be unable to distinguish reality from holographic illusions until the end of their next turn.

Actions.Name: Corrupting Static
Actions.Content: Melee Attack: +3 to hit, dealing 12 (2d8 + 3) lightning damage. On a hit, the target must succeed on a DC 10 Constitution saving throw or have its speed halved until the end of its next turn.

Actions.Name: Holo-Illusion
Actions.Content: Recharge 5â€“6: The Hologram AI creates a 20-ft. cube of holographic terrain and figures. Creatures within the area must succeed on a DC 14 Investigation check to disbelieve the illusion. If they fail, they are considered blinded until the end of their next turn as they interact with the illusory scene.
